result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Joseph John Sterlavage in court with attorney Amanda K. Riek.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct. 1 in 15 CM 690, Judgment to be entered, 16 CM 7 dismissed, read in, Court sentences defendant to: $705.00 fine/costs,  Defendant to submit DNA Sample, 6 days sentence credit,
Attorney Amanda K. Riek appeared w/Authorization. Crystal N Long appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Riek requesting argued plea/sentencing hearings, matter to be set w/JA

Attorney Amanda K. Riek appeared. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Cases called: 15CM690 and 16CM7.  New pretrial and return date requested by attorney Riek.  State had no objection.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 3, 2016 at 01:10 pm.  Return date scheduled for October 20, 2016 at 02:45 pm.
Filed by Atty Amanda Riek, requesting a reset of 8-4-16 return date, due to a scheduling conflict.
Attorney Leonie Dolch appeared w/Authorization. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Dolch requesting reset,  Return date scheduled for August 4, 2016 at 02:45 pm.

Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 18, 2016 at 01:10 pm.  Return date scheduled for May 6, 2016 at 02:45 pm.

Defendant Joseph John Sterlavage by video, in custody with attorney Amanda K. Riek.  Clifford Chase Burdon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  $50.00 cash bond.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  Standard misd. conditions.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 25, 2016 at 02:20 pm.  Return date scheduled for February 11, 2016 at 02:45 pm.
